Description: Abdullah Al Othaim Markets (known as: A.Othaim Market) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since July 2008. A.Othaim Market operates within the Food and Staples Retailing sector focusing on Hypermarkets and Super Centers. It has Companies operating across Bosnia and Herzegovina, Saudi Arabia, Turkey and Egypt. A.Othaim Market is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in May 1980.

Shareholder Name: General Organization for Social Insurance - Saudi Arabia
